# Unicode.GeneralCategory.decimalNumber

**Case**

A decimal digit.

## Declaration

```swift
case decimalNumber
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Decimal_Number` (abbreviated `Nd`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.decimalNumber
